app.name: NEO-CD REDUX
app.long_description:
Emulator updated by megalomaniac.
NEO-CD REDUX, a NeoGeo CD/Z emulator for the Nintendo GameCube console. It owes it's existence to several other emulators, but was initially based on Foster's NeoCD/SDL 0.3.1 and NJ's NeoCDZ emulators. Please read changelog.txt for list of changes. Visit http://www.gc-forever.com for any questions and updates.
